available-languages.label: Available languages
available-languages.description: Sets the languages available for all channels. Individual channels can then support a subset of these languages.

stock-threshold.label: Global out-of-stock threshold
stock-threshold.description: Sets the stock level at which a variant is considered unavailable. Using a negative value allows backorders to be handled. Can be overridden by product variants.

track-inventory.label: Default stock tracking
track-inventory.description: In case of tracking, stock levels of product variants will be automatically adjusted after sale
